hackathon-description-text: Hack2Wear brings together wearable and ubiquitous tech platforms such as Smart Glasses, Smart Watches, Headbands, Wristbands, Beacons, Jewelry, Clothes and more.. Tap into the tech that enables people to do more with less fuss.. Come and take a part in the human re-evolution. Go outside, Breath in life - Hack it, Wear it. See you soon.
hackathon-eligibility: If you've got a passion to build something new
hackathon-rules: Make something and don't break the devices, you're personally in charge of the device!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Did the hack managed to show working demo
